availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Anderson Boster (Webster County, Kentucky, farmer, laborer, and carpenter)

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer, laborer, and carpenter. Ohio native. Son of John Boster. Farmer in Gallia County, Ohio, in 1850. Laborer in Union County, Kentucky, in 1860. Carpenter in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Gallia County, Harrison, p. 99A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 510.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, Dixon, p. 201B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Webster County, KY, August 1863, p. 3.
